reviewText: I bought this for my faith formation class, we don't have  a DVD player available so it was great to be able to purchase in a video. The children learned alot, they talked about how cruel the soldiers were and others in Jerusalem and these kids are kindergarters. I would recommend. It starts out with some kids falling in ahole and  going back to Jerusalem as by standers in Jesus;s day, It caught there attention immediately.
Very happy to find a copy of this animated bible story that we watched with our daughter and now want to pass it on to beautiful grand daughters!
